entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
